outputs.output_descr:
Support coordination effort covers the following areas:
Joint Security Committee staff stipends and office equipment
Planning capacity (training planning workshop and provision of technical advisory services)

New EC contribution as per contract agreement for the implementation of the Rule of Law and Security program throughout Somalia in the program specific areas of Coordination, Law Enforcement, DDR and Small Arms Control, and Judiciary.

Improved credibility, efficacy and independence of the judicial system ;Enhanced capacity of judges, lawyers and other adjudicators to reconcile and harmonize the various legal and customary rules, practices, and systems with international human rights and national constitutional and legal reforms;Establish and strengthen access to justice and legal empowerment for vulnerable groups including women and IDPs

donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr: Improved credibility, efficacy and independence of the judicial system ;Enhanced capacity of judges, lawyers and other adjudicators to reconcile and harmonize the various legal and customary rules, practices, and systems with international human rights and national constitutional and legal reforms;Establish and strengthen access to justice and legal empowerment for vulnerable groups including women and IDPs

project_descr: Support for the coordination for the Rule of Law and Security Programme.
project_title: RULE OF LAW AND SECURITY PROGRAMME
